actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to reduce the excise tax based on investment income of private foundations.

summary.text: Reduces the excise tax imposed on investment income of private foundations by the Internal Revenue Code from four percent to two percent, effective as of the taxable year ending after the date of enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to reduce the excise tax based on investment income of private foundations.
